content.detailedDescription: I was at a bonfire just off the gravel pit on the left hand side. the fire was between myself and the pit, a lil to the left of me. i was looking at the stars and saw two orange orbs, very close together sort of dart in from the trees, headed away from the river on the opposite/to the left of the pit. like it came from the badger rd. northpole area. they came in to about the center of the pit. they shuffled and bounced around eachother while still going in the same direction. one of the orbs "shuffled" in place in the center while the other went past, up, and looped around to the other one, hitting it. it seemed like they were chasing eachother and the other one missed the first stopping and came back around. after the one hit the other they just vanished. they didnt blaze, dart, or fly. they stayed were they were and were just gone. the whole thing lasted maybe 30 sec. and i think one other person may have seen something as well. i was in a group of about 10-20 people, the objects made absolutely no noise. i thought it was strange but kind of dismissed them, until about 2-3 weeks later. my boyfriend was checking the rants and raves section of craigslist and came across a strange article. the "man" who posted the note said that he lived, or was in the badger rd. area a few weeks prior and saw 2 strange objects. he said that they were small orbs that glowed a bright orange/yellow color. he said he saw them move from his area and head back toward the river/fairbanks direction. it aslo said that he thought they were possibly fighting. unfortunately the add was removed before i could reply and i have no idea who this person was. i found this very coincidental and i could not ignore what i saw.
content.flightPath: Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: I looked above the gravel pit and 2 orange orbs shuffled in and over the pit. they sort of bounced around eachother, one hit the other and they disappeared.

content.detailedDescription: Just wondering how i can find out what was in the sky above las vegas, nv today in broad daylight? my wife and i observed something flying slowly back and forth for nearly an hour. i looked at it through my binoculars and at times it appeared to look like a one of the original shuttle mockups prior to us ever actually flying one. i'm pretty sure it was some sort of experimental aircraft but i want to know how i can find out what was flying today?  it was very high up and did not have any contrails even though passenger jets flying over did. it would fade out at times and then fade back in. i suspect that's because of the way the sun was reflecting off of it.
content.summary: Possible experimental craft

content.detailedDescription: I was at my friends house which is about a quarter mile from mine standiing in the yard tossing around a football when i caught a light out of the corner of my eye. it appeared only for a moment just long enough for me and one other to see it. about an hour later we see it again. only this time about six or seven people including myself see it. i saw it first and i screamed for everyone to look. it was a violet looking light that looked about the size of the light on a cell phone tower if you was looking at it from about a mile away. it appeared to drift along a bit then disappeared and reappeared at the exact same time but in a different place. if there was two cell phone towers side by side the distance between the lights is about how far it traveled when it reappeared. i have seen a number of things that seemed unusual in the sky that i didn't put much thought into but this was absolutely amazing. i have never seen anything like it even though it was just a light. it was faster than anything i have ever seen. i haven't seen anything since that night despite staring at the sky almost everyday. i am now a firm believer that ufo's are in our skies.
content.summary: Purple light appeared roughly 1 mile traveled a short distance disappeared and reappeared in a different place at the same time

content.detailedDescription:
i was at a cottage in the 1000 islands region near kingston, ontario and experienced seeing something very abnormal in the sky. i was sitting on a dock over looking a lake when the object appeared from across the lake and moved towards the dock. the object can only be described  as an organic looking connected formation of lights that hovered about 100 feet above the lake. the object moved towards my location initially then moved to the right slowly, while at the same time it changed shape and colour. i remember seeing red, purple, green ,orange and blue. the object's reflection could clearly be seen in the dark lake.  at one point the object even seemed to form a face and arms. it was not a craft or ship of any time was certainly not man made. but it was clearly glowing and and a defined image. it kept moving right before it dropped below the tree line and disappeared.  there were two other witnesses with me, and one of my friends was able to capture several photos (7-12). 

i have attached one of the photos that i have, and if you think that this is something interesting i can get the other photos by contacting my friend. 

it was nothing like i have seen or heard of before. it was not a fire work because it hovered for several minutes before vanishing. i was a little bit frightened when viewing the objects but my friends were laughing and kept saying, "it's not going to hurt us." they didn't seem to be afraid at all. 

any information of this sighting would be greatly appreciated. 

thanks
content.summary: I witnessed an organic looking floating and hovering object. it moved right changing colour and shape. i was able to capture photos of movement as well as shape changing and colour changing.

content.detailedDescription: So i've seen a real ufo or "flying saucer" shaped object a couple weeks prior, and been out at night that summer since looking for more. theres a creek down the street to where my first sighting took place, and around the creek is trees and forests. thought i'd go down there since that is the area where the flying saucer of my first sighting seemed to materialize hoping i'd catch more. didn't really know how lucky i'd be but it was worth a shot. around 1900 hours i begin my trek to the creek. scanned the skies and horizons around me, all i can see are "airplanes". thought to myself, "the skies seem a little too busy... i dont think these are airplanes..." but to give rationalism the benefit of the doubt, let's just say they really were airplanes. so for a while nothing but "airplanes". and one airplane behaving suspiciously caught my eye, seemed to be going very very slow, almost hovering and coming slightly off towards me from northwest-ish (..I want to say?) so to keep myself from being silly i assume it is an airplane, it is then i look the opposite direction of the "airplane". and saw a sphere like object hovering over the trees in the distant horizon. it was orange in color, the same exact color of our orange street lights, so naturally, that is the first thought of rationalism that came to my mind. "it's a huge street light!" i presumed. this sphere was about the width of, maybe, two pine trees off in the horizon it sat. so immediately the second thought that came to mind was a hot air ballon. something that big, hovering, of course it's a hot air balloon... "at this hour???.. in the dark???.. can't see the electric lines! why would somebody be flying a hot air balloon in the dark running the risk of hitting power lines???" i questioned myself. every inch of it was glowing orange, it lit up the trees surrounding it with orange light from its glow. and of course, common sense told me, they don't make street lights that big, nor do i think that is a hot air balloon. so i knew then, that this was what i set out to find. so i keep starring at it, and about 5 - 10 mins of hovering, it starts to move. it moved slowly and deliberately, towards me but slightly off of my direction. and what seemed to be very far away from me at first off in the horizon, only took maybe 30 secs. to maybe a minute to get to within maybe .. .. i want to say 40 - 60 ft. away from me on the opposite side of the creek. my view was constantly obstructed by trees when it began its flight path. the only time i got a clear view of it was when it was hovering over tree tops in the horizon. i think that it changed its elevation and direction because the height of the horizon is significantly higher then the height i was at, and from the direction it began its flight path to where i last saw it, through the trees, the object was very close to me. even seemed like it was going to cross the creek at one point as it flew closer and closer, gradually moving closer to the creek. i eventually lost sight of the object and can no longer see any kind of orange light anywhere whatsoever, even through the trees. so that is where my sighting ends. but the same time i lost sight of the orange sphere, an "airplane" flew out of the tree tops above in the sky, in the same exact spot where i lost sight of it, around the same exact elevation of the object and headed east. an airplane with strobe lights and all, flying pretty low in elevation making no noise whatsoever, slowly going east. now, i'm not going to jump to silly conclusions, but i will say that is one helluva coincidence.
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Path with directional change
content.summary: Arrived at site, maybe,... 10 - 15 mins. before actual sighting. scanned skies and horizons, nothing but

content.detailedDescription:
hi, yesterday���(12-03-11) at around 6:30pm i was walking on the sidewalk and listing to music on my iphone and as am walking i looked at the sky and i seen something completely unnatural not what am use to seeing... there was four orange objects hovering/moving in slow motion.. one of them changed from orange to a reddish color and moved down and quietly, no noise at all, .. and then four of them flew quick high in the sky.... i right away turned off the music and turned on the camera on my iphone to recorded it... as i am looking at them, i heard a normal airplane/jet sound above me in the sky and i could barely see a normal airplane lights blinking (white+green) far high in the sky.. it was flying on the same direction as the 4 orange objects(which it looked like it was chasing the orang flying objects), and the four flying objects suddenly flew far till they disappeared. ...
���

location of seeing the ornage flying objects/���unidentified flying objects;

i was walking on elm street toward buttonwood zoo in new bedford, mass..���
content.summary: 4 orange colored objects and one of them changed to red color as it was hovering down then flew fast high to the sky

content.detailedDescription: I was letting my dog out and it was kinda bright out because the moon was really bright and it was not really cloudy at the time. i first noticed the object because i heard an owl and i looked to the tree then i noticed this odd looking structure in the sky. it was pretty far away but i could see little flashing lights in this odd pattern, and this black/dark blue object was moving north and it seemed to be going rising because the lights got farther and father away. then about a minute after that a group of black military helicopters and this large black plane were flying north following the way the ufo went.
content.summary: Large solid ship, alot of flashing lights in pattern. 4-5 black helicopters in sky after it was gone.

content.detailedDescription: I have video footage of this and you must go to you tube and put into the search engine orange orb ufo florida. the username is under andromeda7761. this is how you can look at it since the original link was moved to another location by mufon.
content.summary: Bright orange glowing orbs over south florida

content.detailedDescription:
Multiple brilliant orange orbs filmed by me on the listed date over broward county (south) florida.  i am a former mufon investigator and this is not cgi. the below video link to the footage is on you tube. it is worth a thousand words. thanks for looking! 

link is    [link moved to fi section/cms/tg]
content.summary: Orange orbs clear footage attached!

content.detailedDescription: Looked of window, saw plinking white lights, then to my right i saw a very large object,triangular object moving slowly. it was solid and white lights on it. no noise. then it dissappeared. it was so large.
content.shape: Blimp,   Circle,   Disc,   Oval,   Star-like,   Triangle
content.summary: Watched blinking lights,then a large triangular object to my left slowly moving through,

content.detailedDescription: The witness is husband to a lady that has had sightings, missing time, and found herself standing naked in her living room at 2 am recently. the husband saw what he described as a being 4 feet tall with long hair. it was in the hallway for 2 seconds looking at him. it then disappeared into a mist.
content.summary: Witness husband does not believe his own eyes but small a small entity

content.detailedDescription:
1. i was home ( out in the country in chillicothe ohio) getting my trash together to take out to the dumpster ( i live in a small mobile home park off of 772. 

2. it was dark outside,very nice clear sky, close to 7:30 pm as i put my trash into the dumpster i turned to walk back to my mobile home, which is a straight dirt road towards the highway, i was walking & seen it moving from behind me which would be moving west to east. 

3. at first i new it was a ufo since (a rumor has been circulating in town) as to why all the jets have been in over our city)as well as it was just above the power-lines, as if it had an intelligent navigation system. the object swooped down from the hill behind me, as i kept my eye on it since i was looking in the same direction it was going. and it moved to fast to be so low towards the ground, without zero sound. i lost visual after it vanished among the small hill moving east. 

4. the object was very soft in color, as yellow white/gold and it had a cast off as in a backwards c shape like a white see through yellow from it's movement appeared to be vibrating not staying the same identical shape first oval, then round then oval again and the cast off light was shifting in shape as it transformed. it was fairly small i would say about as big as my mid size vehicle, maybe a little bigger, but not much. 

5. i stopped and looked behind me, to see if any of my neighbors were out and seen, but i was alone. i immediately grabbed my cell phhone in which, for the 1st time since i've owned it did not have a signal so i took my phone outside and with one bar! ((i am still having issues with getting a signal)) never had problems with this phone~!) i called my daughter because she mentioned one of her girlfriends seen an object in town earlier that week while she was taking a smoke break from work.  and we have had a lot of fighter jets in the area for the first time since i've lived her for a year. 

6. i lost sight of it once it descended beyond the hill moving east

note: i have had an encounter with an alien in my bedroom when i was 14 years old at my parents home while we lived in chesapeake ohio basically on the ohio river. it was a very tall being, i was on the top bunk bed and it stood there and watched me without moving! i awoke from a very deep sleep to see it there, i was so frightened i held my breath an tried to act as if i was a bear pretending to be dead as a child would believe might work. i ended up going back to sleep without immediate memory until i was a bit older. leaving me to be sensitively aware of my surroundings. 


i live a lone with my dog n hope i am safe. i am now 44 years old. i still dont have any cell service i did earlier today but now it is 1:55 am and no signal.
content.summary: It was a soft bright yellow with an off cast of white yellow as in shadow of the objects cast off

content.detailedDescription: Black triangle about 1000 feet in the sky flew right over me on highway 50 right before the capital city freeway exit. it was flying in a southeast direction. flight was slow, and in a straight path. when it was directly overhead i stuck my head out of my window and saw it against the night sky. perfect triangle shape. one white light on each corner, a red light in the middle. the rear two lights blinked in a non random pattern, the rest of the lights were non blinking. attached is a quick illustration of what i saw. my opinion is that it was a military blimp type object. it had no regular faa anti collision lighting configuration.
content.summary: Black triangle with a light on each corner, rear lights blinked, light in middle on bottom was red.

content.detailedDescription: Came over my house from direction of camnp penelton marine base made no noise strobbed on and off flew slow but straight to slow to be plane.  came home and saw it at 6 pm on decemeber 4th 2011.  ive seen ufos prior this was first time i took pictures.  eventually the object just floated away out of sight silently.  having been around ufos before and had many other strange experiences i wasnt afraid of it but i felt the need to get pictures this time and just happened to have my camera in my car, ima keep it in there just in case this thing comes back.
content.summary: Flew over house from camp penelton marine base into ceanside city airspace, made no sound

content.detailedDescription:
My wife and i were sitting on the front porch around 6:45 when i saw two, big, bright, lite- blue lights apppear. i told my wife to look and thats when she saw them too. they were moving very quickly and silently from right(north) to left(south). we live near a nuclear power plant and the airspace around here is restricted. we both watched the lights as they moved across in front of us and then they just disappeared, gone, poof. they were big, moved quickly but made no noise, before they disappeared.
i looked in the newspaper and on the internet today to see if anyone had reported seeing a ufo in the area last night and i could find no reports of any
content.summary: Two bright big blue-white lights move from left to right and then just disappeared as we watched

content.detailedDescription: I just went outside to throw some trash saw something bright in the sky, thought it was a helicopter since helicopter activity has been increased the past few months. went back outside 5 minutes later and it was in the same exact spot, it pulsated blue and yellow then started to flicker, then dim then suddenly dissappear and i could see the clouds behind it very clear like it just vanished so i know it wasnt a helicopter because there was no noise and it wasn't a plan because it was just low enough not to be a plane and also it just vanished into thin air, father saw it as well.
content.summary: Strange hovering light.

content.detailedDescription:
on dec 4 2011, at about 5:15 pm, my family and i were leaving the sams club on airport rd in allentown pa.
 i saw a man and women looking up at the sky, so i looked up to see what they were looking at.
 it was then i saw the 3 objects in the sky traveling in about a sw to ne direction, in a single line, with the last object slightly to the east of that line. at arms length the distance between the first and last objects was about 16 inches, and they seemed to be equidistant apart.
 at first i saw what appeared to be flames in an orange red color at the bottom center of the objects. this made me think these were hot air balloons i was looking at, but i could not see any gondola below the flames, and the flames seemed to go downward instead of upward. they were also moving much too fast to be balloons.
 as they got closer the flames started going on and off, when they were on you could see the surface of the object as a lighter grey color, but with no defined or sharp edges. they were circular in appearance, and the middle object appeared to wobble, even when no flame was emitted.
 when the flame was out, they appeared to look almost transparent grey-whitish in color.
 as they passed by, the second object moved closer to the first object, while the third object kept the same distance from the first. then all flames stopped, and stayed out for the rest of the sighting.
 they then changed course to a slightly more easterly direction and seemed to vanish in the distance before i could get to my vehicle to get my camera.
 there were no other lights visible on these objects other than the flames, and no sound what so ever from them.
 i think the total time from when i first saw them  at about 30 deg above the horizon to the sw until i lost sight of them at about 45 deg above horizon to the ene was about 40 seconds.
 my wife saw some people taking pictures with their phones, but they left before we could ask the if they got anything they could see.
 me and my wife were amazed that we actually might have seen something unexplained such as a ufo, but my 9 year old daughter was truly scared.
content.summary: I saw 3 unknown objects traveling approximately sw to ne in allentown pa

content.detailedDescription:
December 4th 5 pm okc, ok 2011
i was practicing at lake hefner golf course when i heard loud fighter in formation jets coming. this things looked mean like real deal fighter jets.  the flew directly over head at low altitude ( could see good detail on the jets. bigger than thumb at arms length. they were flying low enough the sound was deafening and i had to plug my ears due to pain.  i clearly saw 3 jets fly sw. then it seemed a another craft manifested. it appeared to have no wings and flew into the sunset at west.  it was cigar shaped.  the jets made definite sound as the flew away from the cigar but there was no sound coming from cigars direction.  there has been a lot of military black helicopters, two wing helicopters and jets over okc lately. also  pusating light ufos hovering and that flew physically impossible  on the 30th november just a few days ago. and everyone i talked has seen odd lights and craft almost every night in november. something is definitely going on in okc.
content.summary: 3 fighter jets in formation over okc. cigar shape appeared and flew into sunset

content.detailedDescription:
11/12/11 @ 10:01 pm, was arriving home after working 16 hours, day was very long and felt surreal.  was getting out of my car, and all of a sudden my two neighbors who were up on porch told me to quikly look into the sky, and asked me what it was.  i screamed "it's a f'n ufo" as the hairs were standing up on the back of my neck and i have  no doubt in my mind what it was.  i walked up stairs one flight to get a better vantage point.

there were two basball sized orange egg shaped orbs with a yellow blurry pulsating glow around them.  one quikly decended, acended, then quickly shot off.  this was w/ in 15 seconds of lying my eyes upon it.

the other one was hovering strangely and pulsating.  this was over the river, a couple hundred feet away.  after hovering/pulsating abot 60 seconds, it turned directions abruptly and the moved off, but slower than the other one did.

i was trying to remain calm during the whole experience, so glad i saw this, but sad i could not get to my cammera quick enough.  after the whole experience i was reenergied, even though i had ust had an extremely long day.
content.summary: 2 orange fuzzy orbs

content.detailedDescription: On the afternoon of oct. 15th i was working in my home in redlands when one of my children came in very excited yelling that there was a "red thing" in the sky. so i went outside to see what this was and when i got to the driveway my oldest son was pointing up at about a 75 to 80 degree angle, very straight up when i saw a shiny red bullet shaped object hovering about 4-500 feet up. after letting my eyes adjust to the brightness of the sky, because it was a very bright and clear day, i could see a smaller grey round object hovering next to it at about the 11:00 position. this object really took me back because at first i was about to dismiss the whole thing as an aircraft or something till i saw what this was doing. it was spinning over like a basketball and it was colored white and grey. as it was doing this both objects were descending then ascending. then they would stop and descend again. about that time i had to look for one of my children so i took my eyes off the object for about 10 seconds and when i looked back it was gone. i had asked my oldest some to watch for it while i went to find the camera but he said he did see where it went either. my neighbor stood outside with us looking for it for a while but we never saw it again. all total me and two of my three sons saw this object, and to this day when i walk outside my house i still look for it. i was very hesitant to report this but after watching a show with some members from mufon on it i feel much better about doing it now.
content.summary: 2 objects - red bullet and grey and white ball- witnessed over redlands ca

content.detailedDescription: I was up at my usual 530 am. just put coffee on the stove wen i noticed a cluster of lights,hovering just over my trees that separate us with our neighbor . at first it caught my eye,then i went back into kitchen, just then my husband had awoken off of couch facing porch window where object was in clear view. he then literally wiped his eyes and asked me if i had seen what he was witnessing.  i said yes and we both observed the object hover for about 30 more second and started to slowly head south, my husband then ran out front of the house and watched the object fade out of view.
content.summary: The ufo was a rectangular shape, with all sorts of different lights pulsating from it. it hovered in between my house and the neighbor s house for several minutes, before slowly heading south until it vanished.

content.detailedDescription: My wife and i awoke as usual at 4:20 am. while i was getting dressed, my wife went to the kitchen to make coffee. she noticed out the window that there was a spherical light, quite bright, over the roof(at an elevation of about 40 ft agl)of a house on our street. the house is on the opposite side of the street, and 2 houses up. she was curious about the light and went to 3 different windows in the house to see it. she said that it was white, with a slightly yellowish crescent on the side. the sphere stayed stationary, but started to dim a little, but as it did, the roof under it got very, very bright. she watched as it just faded quickly out. at this point my wife became quite anxious and called to me. she told me about what she saw, and we both looked out the window for a while longer. we noticed that the person living in the house seemed quite animated, and was going from room to room, turning on and shutting off lights in the house. we have never observed any motion in that house so early in the morning. i went outside and continued looking for anything unusual, and toyed with the idea of knocking on the door of the house, but didn't want to start anything. i saw nothing additional. afterwards, in daytime, my wife and i looked closely at the property and at every possible source of the light, but saw nothing that could account for what she saw. there is a road on a hill behind the house, but even with a spot light, it would be impossible to illuminate the roof facing our street from that angle. my wife is convinced that she saw something unexplicable. she is a person of impeccable character, level headed, and not prone to exaggeration or fantasy. i have made this report based on her eye-witness account because her first language is not english and she felt more comfortable with my writing it.
content.summary: orb over house lit roof

content.detailedDescription: My mom was driving me home from school, when we got out of the car, we were going up the front steps to the house when i looked back behind me and saw a black-ish/gray, circular disk going fast thru the sky. i was very scared. it did not look like any plane.
content.summary: Very fast and it did not look like a plane
content.locationName: Actualy it happend in han, Pennsylvania

content.detailedDescription: My mom was driving me home from school, when we got out of the car, we were going up the front steps to the house when i looked back behind me and saw a black-ish/gray, circular disk going fast thru the sky. i was very scared. it did not look like any plane.
content.summary: Very fast and it did not look like a plane
content.locationName: Actualy it happend in han, Pennsylvania

content.detailedDescription: Went out back door of the house to take a smoke break from the big 10 football championship (michigan state and wisconsin). while smoking a cigarette, standing on the sidewalk, 10 feet from the house (on the north side of the house), i looked to the west.  approximately 20 ft away, by a large pine tree, was standing this little creature.  oval, black and white, at first thought it was a skunk, but it had two large yellow/green eyes staring at me(approx. 6 inches oval).  they almost glowed.  it didn't move. it stood about 2 to 3 feet tall.  i went back in to finish seeing the football game.  came out, again at approximately 12:15 a.M., after the game, to smoke again and it was gone. it was not a skunk, raccoon, cat, dog, coyote, possum or any other animal.  it stood up and stared at me with no movement.  first time i have ever, first hand, seen a creature like that.
content.summary: Little creature with big eyes staring at me 20-30 ft away.

content.detailedDescription: I was sitting on the front porch at eleven pm sippin my tea. i heard this soft rumbeling noise coming from above. it was this large black triangle. most people say they dont make nosise!But i have tenitius. so i have hearing problems. but i have a unique knack for hearing machine sounds. the sound i heard sounded like a quiet ramjet being used. the craft was traveling from west south west to north north east. at what seemed a realley slow pace.I suppose in relation to its size it must have been moving fast. as it looked to be a mile across. larger than the town that it was traversing. i did not have time to take photos of it, and i did not tell any one about  this incident until this summer. knowing all too well they might think that i am a kook!
content.summary: Heard rumbeling noise first  then saw it flying over town. dim lights on the corners. atleast a mile wide.

content.detailedDescription: I was traveling to work early in the morning. noticed light to the passengers side of vehicle. light seemed to be keeping pace with me. coming in closer then out farther, then back in. after watching for a while. i no longer remember anything and found myself 45 mile closer to my destination then the last moments i remember and a hour and a half later in the morning then the last moments i remember.
content.distance: 20 Feet or Less, 21-100 Feet, 101-500 Feet, 501 Feet - 1 Mile
content.summary: Time lost after sighting

content.detailedDescription:
We observed lights in the sky on 21 september 2011 for about 15-20 minutes. object had three lights in a triangular formation in the northwestern sky. i am located in dover, tn and i was standing outside the back door of my home. prior to seeing this i was inside working on my computer when i heard a call to come look at something in the sky.  

at first i thought it might be something from the near by military base but the object made no sound. we frequently have helicopters fly over and occasionally other military type crafts (chinooks and other large transport style aircraft)but this did not look like anything we had ever seen before.

as i stated before, the object had three lights in a triangular formation. it appeared to hover for several seconds and then it would move very fast but it would not make any sound. the object would move across and out of my line of sight and several minutes later it would appear in the sky again. for the most part it stayed over the tree line but on two occasions it appeared to come closer and was almost directly over my home. when it was closest to my home there was no sound and one light appeared to shine very brightly down on us. all of a sudden it flew away very fast without making any sound. when it was over us only the lights were visible. i could not see anything but the lights of the object. 

we did not know exactly what the object was but we were very curious. i managed to take two videos with my phone (sorry, i attempted to keep a steady hand but it was a little shaky due to my excitement). unfortunately, i was unable to get my phone ready when the object was closest to me i was focused on looking up at the object. 

the flight pattern of the object appeared to be in a large oval shape. it completed this pattern several times during the 15-20 minutes we were outside. eventually, the object went out of our line of sight and did not return. 

*please note that the other witness observed the object longer and might be able to provide more details that i could not.
content.flightPath: Stationary,Hovering then path,Path with directional change
content.summary: Observed lights in the sky over field in dover, tn around 9:30pm on 21 september 2011

content.detailedDescription:
On wednesday november 30th i was driving around 8 pm and saw two out of place super bright stars to the nw. i thought nothing of them besides there size and luminosity and the fact they've  never been there before. also, i saw another craft to the east that appeared to be a net with its head lights on. (3 headlights)  

  after leaving my destination around 11pm i notices that those bright " stars " were gone and now there was four to be what appeared jets with headlights on. one had blue green and purple lights, another purple and blue and the other two were blinking red and white. 

i tried to dismiss them as uavs or jets but their flight patters were bizarre.  the would fly then completely stop and hover. they also appeared to be looking for something as they would turn their head lights on and off ( except the head lights  ever pointed down or illuminated the ground). they would fly and cross paths the  swoop around and comeback the direction the came ( think figure 8 flight pattern). 

i was intrigued and saw one coming from straight north and headed it off and parked at starbucks on memorial and macarthur. as soon as it came closer i realized it was not near as high as a n"jer and was only a few hundred feet up.  it then stopped directly over my parked car. i felt as if i was being watched because this one hadn't stopped yet until it was directly over me. it looked similar to normal plane shape but looked areodynamically wrong.  it made no noise what so ever. dim lights illuminated the bottom and there appeared to be portholes on the side. it also had solid green and blue lights.  it hovered over my car until another one from the  nw came with its headlights on( it was silent as well).  then the both took off south and  and flew back north. 

the other one was hovering over the east tulsa exit on the kilpatrick turnpike. blinking blue and purple.
i called my friend to look ( he was about 10 miles sse)  he saw them immediately and became very excited. he lived very near remmington park  casino and said he watched one hover over the race track there. it blinked purple and blue and change blinking speeds.  then he said later it took off.





oddities:

the crafts made no noise.

the could hover at will 

 low to ground

changes in blinking patterns and light color.

could speed up intstantly and change directions to fast to be physically feasible

headlights on and off

six of them. two remained still while others were "searching" flying in a figure 8 pattern and sweeping back and forth 

appeared to be super bright stars that could change colors at distance
 
stuck out like sore thumbs

also

this is more than likely  coincidence but my friend said he saw earlier that night a blue light that appeared to touch ground in the distance.
content.flightPath: Stationary,Hovering then path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: Looked like stars at distance. headbeam. multicolored light. hovering. appeared to be searching no noise

content.detailedDescription:
As i turned left onto my street, i observed three lights in a loose chevron pattern hovering above a service station about 200 yards distant. i parked and exited my vehicle and walked to the street to get a better look, but the object had vanished. several neighbors were also outside looking in the same direction. i did not ask if anyone else had seen the object.
the event took place just before 7:00 pm on december 3, 2011. i was returning from the grocery. as i turned the corner i spotted the lights. they seemed to be out of place. the area is well lit and the service station is brightly lit at night. the lights were motionless above the station and were gone by the time i got out of my vehicle.
content.summary: Witnessed lights while driving. object was gone by the time i parked.
